Title: Authorizes the impoundment of any motor vehicle operated by a person who drives while ability impaired or intoxicated
Summary: Authorizes the impoundment of any motor vehicle operated by a person who drives while ability is impaired or intoxicated; provides for the imposition of towing and storage fees; provides for the release of impounded vehicles upon compliance with certain conditions.
LawCode: Amd ยง1194, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the impoundment of motor vehicles operated by persons driving while ability impaired or while intoxicated
